text: Libon may refer to: *Libon (architect), an ancient Greek architect *Libon (Bithynia), a town of ancient Bithynia *Libon (service), a VoIP and instant messaging application for smartphones *Libon, Albay, Philippines *A village in the Logo Anseba district of Eritrea ==See also== *:fr:Libon, Ivan Terlecki (1972), French cartoonist
title: Libon
